fields.title: APR Offer

fields.description: Enable if bonus categories have spending limits (adds ** footnote)

fields.description: Enter as dollar amount (e.g., 95 for $95)

fields.description: Total value of annual credits/benefits (e.g., 300 for $300)

fields.title: Annual Credits ($)

fields.description: Points per dollar on travel (e.g., 3 for 3x points = 3%)
fields.name: travelMultiplier
fields.title: Travel Earning (%)

fields.description: Airport lounge access details (e.g., "Priority Pass Select with unlimited visits")
fields.name: loungeBenefits

fields.description: Transfer partners and redemption options (e.g., "1:1 transfers to Hyatt, United")
fields.name: partnerBenefits

fields.description: Other perks (e.g., "Trip delay insurance, no foreign transaction fees")
